channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Alaska election officials to recalculate signatures for ranked vote repeal measure after court order
item.description: A state court judge has disqualified a number of booklets used to gather signatures for an initiative that aims to repeal Alaska’s ranked choice voting system.

item.title: Longtime US Rep Sheila Jackson Lee of Texas, who had pancreatic cancer, has died
item.description: Longtime U.S. Rep. Sheila Jackson Lee of Texas has died. She was 74. The Democrat had represented her Houston-based district since 1995.

item.title: Outside the RNC, small Milwaukee businesses and their regulars tried to salvage a sluggish week
item.description: The Republican National Convention didn’t deliver an overwhelming victory to some small businesses in downtown Milwaukee.
